javadoc.text: * Lower symmetrical positive definite banded matrix. It does not enforce this * property (except for symmetry), and has the same storage layout as{@link no.uib.cipr.matrix.LowerSymmBandMatrix LowerSymmBandMatrix}.

javadoc.param: nSize of the matrix. Since the matrix must be square, this * equals both the number of rows and columns
kdNumber of bands off the main diagonal (off diagonals)
AMatrix to copy contents from. Only the parts of A * that lie within the allocated band are copied over, the rest * is ignored
kdNumber of bands off the main diagonal (off diagonals)
AMatrix to copy contents from. Only the parts of A * that lie within the allocated band are copied over, the rest * is ignored
kdNumber of bands off the main diagonal (off diagonals)
deepTrue for a deep copy. For shallow copies, A * must be a banded matrix
